tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE location_data (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
latitude FLOAT,
longitude FLOAT,
address STRING);

CREATE TABLE ar_objects (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
name STRING,
model_url STRING,
location_id INT,
FOREIGN KEY (location_id) REFERENCES location_data(id));

CREATE TABLE Users (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(100),
    location_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (location_id) REFERENCES Locations(id)
);

CREATE TABLE ARModels (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    model_name VARCHAR(50),
    description TEXT,
    location_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (location_id) REFERENCES Locations(id)
);

CREATE TABLE Ratings (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    location_id INT,
    rating FLOAT,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(id),
    FOREIGN KEY (location_id) REFERENCES Locations(id)
);

CREATE TABLE events (
  event_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  event_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  event_location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  start_time TIMESTAMP,
  end_time TIMESTAMP
);
